import React from 'react' import { render } from 'react-dom' import Styles from './Styles' import { Form, Field } from 'react-final-form' import Card from './Card' import { formatCreditCardNumber, formatCVC, formatExpirationDate } from './cardUtils' import { TextField, Button, Typography, Stack, Container } from '@mui/material' import Page from '.././Page'; import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { size } from 'lodash' import { color } from '@mui/system' const sleep = ms => new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms)) const onSubmit = async values => { await sleep(300) window.alert(JSON.stringify(values, 0, 2)) } const styles ={ btn:{ width:'150px', height:'40px', fontSize:'20px', marginTop: '10px', color:'white' } } const PaymentPage = () => ( Choose your Testers
{ return (




Base Rate: $5 Total Price of Testers (15): $120
) }} />
) export default PaymentPage;
